## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass
- [ ] Environment variables updated
- [ ] Security implications considered
- [ ] Migration included (if schema changes)
- [ ] Screenshots added for UI changes
- [ ] Does this increase clarity?
- [ ] Does this reduce anxiety?
- [ ] Is the default state calm?
- [ ] Is AI gated and explainable?
- [ ] Does this respect user trust?
